data.title: celebrity sightings in CX?
data.meta_description: Cathay Pacific | Cathay - celebrity sightings in CX? - Originally Posted by JNLentertainment how about takeshi kaneshiro? anyone seen him in cx? Based in Taiwan, I think, he is a personality hired by JL to promote its Japan-Taiwan services offered by subsidiary EG. I would think JL would not want him to be seen flying
data.text:
May 21, 2005, 6:57 am

Join Date: Sep 1999

Location: New York

Posts: 3,383

Quote:

Originally Posted by JNLentertainment

how about takeshi kaneshiro? anyone seen him in cx?

Based in Taiwan, I think, he is a personality hired by JL to promote its Japan-Taiwan services offered by subsidiary EG. I would think JL would not want him to be seen flying CX on Japan-Taiwan routes at least.

Josh hartnett First class August 9 CX918 MNL-HKG and HKG-LAX CX 880 First Class. He is a nice guy.

Renee Zellweger on CX889 from JFK to YVR last year (very low key and impeccably behaved).

Thomas Kwok on CX889 from YVR to HKG 2 weeks ago.

Aug 10, 2007, 9:55 am

Join Date: Dec 2006

Programs: MP Diamond

Posts: 99

Leon Lai and gf (some HK model who I now forget) on HKG - JFK. I was in 2k and they were in the middle seats in row 2.

Very polite to fans and the crew on the flight. And he 'helped' me score a second serving of caviar. He asked for one, and got it, and they offered to me as I was stting right across the aisle.

I had absolutely no idea who they were until I asked the FA on my way out the door. I knew something was up when they boarded and people ran up from J to have their pics taken with Leon and to ask for autographs.

For the unmotivated heres the imdb profile on Lin http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0510857/

Posts: 544

HKG-TPE is the Cantopop Express

Several years ago I flew CX J from HKG-TPE and saw Karen Mok sitting across us, wearing dark glasses. She got on at the last minute (as typical for entertainment types).

A couple of years ago, spotted Sammo Hung before, during and after a BR flight from HKG - TPE. He actually signed some autographs for fans in the baggage claim area at Taoyuan Airport.

The Hong Kong to Taipei flights are good for spotting entertainers - because of the pop stars in one locale are often popular in the other area, and they may do recording/filming in both places.

Leon Lai and gf (some HK model who I now forget) on HKG - JFK. I was in 2k and they were in the middle seats in row 2.

Very polite to fans and the crew on the flight. And he 'helped' me score a second serving of caviar. He asked for one, and got it, and they offered to me as I was stting right across the aisle.

I had absolutely no idea who they were until I asked the FA on my way out the door. I knew something was up when they boarded and people ran up from J to have their pics taken with Leon and to ask for autographs.

Was on the same flight with him but on SQ's new B777-300ER in F.

He & Gayle Lok (girlfriend) were accross the aisle from me.

Very nice couple.
